response.original_title: Cut Short: Fighting Against Knives in the North
response.overview: In the north of England, a mother and a young man irreversibly changed by knives explore the causes and consequences of knife culture for today’s youth.
response.tagline: In the north of England, a mother and a young man irreversibly changed by knives explore the causes and consequences of knife culture for today’s youth.
response.title: Cut Short: Fighting Against Knives in the North
